bioconda.name: bioconductor-cardinal
bioconda.summary: A mass spectrometry imaging toolbox for statistical analysis

biotools.summary: Implements statistical and computational tools for analyzing mass spectrometry imaging datasets, including methods for efficient pre-processing, spatial segmentation, and classification.

bioschemas.name: Cardinal
bioschemas.summary: Implements statistical and computational tools for analyzing mass spectrometry imaging datasets, including methods for efficient pre-processing, spatial segmentation, and classification.
